name: vietnam-ewallet-exchange
description: Vietnam E-Wallet Exchange System - Comprehensive digital wallet platform for Vietnam market

scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:wallet" "npm run dev:transaction" "npm run dev:payment"
scripts.dev:web: concurrently "npm run dev:customer-portal" "npm run dev:merchant-portal" "npm run dev:admin-dashboard"
scripts.build: npm run build:services && npm run build:web
scripts.build:services: npm run build:auth && npm run build:user && npm run build:wallet && npm run build:transaction && npm run build:payment
scripts.build:web: npm run build:customer-portal && npm run build:merchant-portal && npm run build:admin-dashboard
scripts.test: npm run test:services && npm run test:web
scripts.test:services: npm run test:auth && npm run test:user && npm run test:wallet && npm run test:transaction && npm run test:payment
scripts.test:web: npm run test:customer-portal && npm run test:merchant-portal && npm run test:admin-dashboard
scripts.lint: npm run lint:services && npm run lint:web
scripts.lint:services: npm run lint:auth && npm run lint:user && npm run lint:wallet && npm run lint:transaction && npm run lint:payment
scripts.lint:web: npm run lint:customer-portal && npm run lint:merchant-portal && npm run lint:admin-dashboard
scripts.setup: npm run setup:deps && npm run setup:db && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:deps: npm install && npm run setup:deps:services && npm run setup:deps:web
scripts.setup:deps:services: cd services/auth-service && npm install && cd ../user-service && npm install && cd ../wallet-service && npm install && cd ../transaction-service && npm install && cd ../payment-service && npm install
scripts.setup:deps:web: cd apps/web/customer-portal && npm install && cd ../merchant-portal && npm install && cd ../admin-dashboard && npm install
scripts.setup:db: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.clean: npm run clean:node_modules && npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:logs
scripts.security:scan: npm audit && npm run security:scan:services && npm run security:scan:web
scripts.security:scan:services: cd services/auth-service && npm audit && cd ../user-service && npm audit && cd ../wallet-service && npm audit && cd ../transaction-service && npm audit && cd ../payment-service && npm audit
scripts.security:scan:web: cd apps/web/customer-portal && npm audit && cd ../merchant-portal && npm audit && cd ../admin-dashboard && npm audit

author: Vietnam E-Wallet Exchange Team

hooks.pre-push: npm run test && npm run lint
